pytraj.TrajectoryIterator¶

TrajectoryIterator.load(filename=None, top=None, frame_slice=(0, -1, 1))¶

load trajectory/trajectories from filename/filenames with a single frame_slice or a list of frame_slice

TrajectoryIterator.iterframe(*args, **kwd)¶

create frame iterator. same as frameiter

iterate traj by a chunk (alias of iterchunk)
